text: Lazlo Bane is an alternative rock band. They are from Santa Monica, California, United States. They are well known for collaborating with former Men at Work member Colin Hay, and providing the song "Superman" as the theme for the television show Scrubs. They were formed in 1995. The band's origin can be traced back to the efforts of Chad Fischer touring with School of Fish in the early 1990s as a drummer. title: Lazlo Bane
